body:
Overview

You can change the schedule of an interview to be held at a different time. When you reschedule an interview, HackerRank automatically sends email notifications to the respective candidate and the interviewer(s), informing them about the updated time of the interview.

Note: You can only reschedule HackerRank interviews that are scheduled and unused.

Reschedule an Interview

Prerequisites

  • You must have created and scheduled a HackerRank interview.
  1. On the HackerRank for Work home page, click on the Interview tab. The interviews landing page displays the list of all interviews created by you.
  1. Click on the interview entry you want to reschedule.
  2. The Interview Details window appears. Navigate to the Interview schedule.
  3. Change the date, time, and duration, and appropriately set the time zone.
  4. In the Notes field, add any notes regarding the change in the interview schedule, if necessary.Â 
  5. Click Save and Send Email to send the invite mail to the candidates.

The interview schedule is updated, and all the interview participants will be notified about the updated schedule.
title: Rescheduling an Interview
